definitions.definition: Resembling or likened to a bear , typically in being rough , surly , or clumsy .
Characterized by or expecting falling prices.
labels: of the price of financial instruments
definitions.label_groups: stock market , of the price of financial instruments

main_definition: Resembling or likened to a bear , typically in being rough , surly , or clumsy .
secondary_definitions: ( stock market , of the price of financial instruments ) Characterized by or expecting falling prices.
( by extension ) Pessimistic about the future .
